title: Smart Janghai informational homepage with branded hero image

requirements.summary: Implement the Smart Janghai public homepage with hero (brand + tagline) and additional informational sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage renders without errors and shows the brand name text exactly as “SMART JANGHAI”.
Hero section includes a short English tagline beneath the brand name.
Page includes at least two additional informational sections below the hero (content can be placeholder English text).
All user-facing text is in English.

file_operations.description: Create the Smart Janghai homepage view with a hero section (brand name “SMART JANGHAI” + short English tagline) and at least two additional informational sections (e.g., Intro and Highlights) plus a simple footer. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card, Separator) to structure sections; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a simple public site layout wrapper (header/container/footer slots) to keep spacing and typography consistent across the homepage. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Separator) where appropriate; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a minimal informational footer component (English-only text) used by the homepage.

Wire the new HomePage into the app so it becomes the public homepage view (no additional routes/pages beyond what is required). Ensure the homepage renders by default without requiring authentication.

requirements.summary: Add the generated hero image as a static asset and use it as the primary visual in the homepage hero with readable overlay text.
acceptanceCriteria: The generated image file is present under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact required filename.
Homepage hero visually uses the generated image (as an or CSS background) and remains readable (brand name and tagline have sufficient contrast).
No backend calls are used to serve or fetch the image.

file_operations.description: Add the generated image asset exactly as required: frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-smart-janghai.dim_1920x1080.png.

Update the hero to use the static image at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-smart-janghai.dim_1920x1080.png as the hero background/primary visual, and add an overlay/scrim and text styling to ensure the brand name and tagline remain readable with sufficient contrast (no backend fetch).

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive, modern non-blue-and-purple-dominant theme and ensure responsive layout across the homepage.
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across hero, sections, and footer (typography scale, spacing, and component styling feel unified).
Primary palette is not dominated by blue & purple together (choose an alternative modern palette).
Layout is responsive for mobile and desktop (no overlapping text in hero).

file_operations.description: Adjust global theme tokens/variables and base typography to a cohesive modern palette that is not dominated by blue & purple together (e.g., neutral + emerald/teal accent, or neutral + warm amber accent). Keep changes consistent with Tailwind/shadcn-ui token usage and ensure readable contrast.

Update/extend Tailwind theme configuration as needed to support the chosen non-blue-and-purple-dominant palette and consistent typography/spacing utilities (without modifying any files under frontend/src/components/ui).

Refine responsive layout (mobile-to-desktop) for hero and sections: ensure no overlapping hero text, consistent spacing, and unified component styling. Use shadcn-ui components for consistent UI primitives where helpful; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure the shared layout applies consistent container widths, vertical rhythm, and typography across hero/sections/footer for a unified theme.
